product information:
The black HP L2045W monitor features a 20-inch widescreen with 1680x1050 resolution and 16:10 aspect ratio. This HP LCD monitor with 16.2 million colors at a 0.258 mm pixel pitch offers high-definition video quality. This HP 20-inch monitor has two built-in USB 2.0 ports for easy system expandability and connectivity. Featuring a super-fast 5 ms response time, the HP L2045W ensures seamless color switching for enhanced motion video and gaming. Equipped with D-sub and DVI connectors, this HP LCD monitor supports both analog and digital inputs. Further, this HP 20-inch monitor automatically senses your power voltage and frequency and also sets it for you.
